assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Institutional Review Board of Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkorn University, Thailand (IRB No. 264/62). Written informed consent was obtained from parents or legal guardians of the participants.
